label: Create an edit with ChatGPT
name: editChatgpt
description: This flow step will create an edit with chatgpt endpoint.

inputs.label: Input
inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Content to be sent to the server.

inputs.label: Instruction
inputs.name: instruction
inputs.description: The instruction that tells the model how to edit the prompt.

fields.label: Max Tokens
fields.name: max_tokens
fields.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion.

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

fields.label: Temperature
fields.name: temperature
fields.description: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher makes the output random, lower deterministic.

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

fields.label: Top P
fields.name: top_p
fields.description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass.

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

fields.label: N
fields.name: n
fields.description: How many completions to generate for each prompt.

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

fields.label: User
fields.name: user
fields.description: A unique identifier representing your end-user.

fields.label: Connection timeout
fields.name: connectionTimeout
fields.description: Connect timeout interval, in milliseconds (0 = infinity). Default value: 5000 ms (5 sec)

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

fields.label: Read timeout
fields.name: readTimeout
fields.description: Read timeout interval, in milliseconds (0 = infinity). Default value: 60000 ms (60 sec)

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.
